_sText:
WiP Alpha version of TS2_IceStation

This map is a remake of TimeSplitters2 map IceStation, adapted for CSS Defuse mode.  However while I am currently reworking the landscape to allow better DE gameplay, this is a much better deathmatch map.

Layout has gone through many iterations to help support a DE game mode however nothing is final and there are many issues with balance.

If you would like a "Classic" release using original layout, please let me know (only would work for DM - not suitable for DE mode)

*Note this map is a remake based on the original from Timesplitters series - No content has been ported and the map has been built from scratch using Counter-Strike: Source assets only.

Uploading here for anyone who wants to see this WiP, feedback etc.  I will not be updating this project for a while as I am working on other maps while I think how to fix this one. (:

Latest Release:: V0.2a

!!Known Issues To Be Fixed Later!!

-No Radar

-Missing detailing / Texture work

-Layout and LoS tweaks

-Displacement re-work

-Minor bugs in geometry

-No custom Nav Mesh

-No Sounscape

-Skybox rework

-Fog changes

-Spawn changes

-Adjustment to encounter timing on map extremities

-Add cover to Tspawn from mid/ct snipers

-Improve lighting

-Add cover to tunnels

Thankyou
